name: Waldog
description:
[Waldog Open Alpha]

Disclaimer: We at Land Ice do not condone violence towards humans or animals.

Land Ice brings you the heart-warming tale of struggling against insurmountable odds to find meaning in a world full of confusion, frustration, and hatred. The lines between right and wrong are blurred, and in the end the meaning of life becomes clear.

In Waldog players are tasked with finding justice, but at what price?

Based on true events.

" The first game to truly capture the experience of childbirth. 10/10 " - Jimmy Carter

" [Waldog] is a triumph... Truly a stunning story accessible to all ages. 9/10 " - Georgia O'Keeffe

" I met my wife playing this game. We've been divorced for 5 years now." - Anhotep I

Any / all similarities to people living or dead are merely coincidental. That video is completely unrelated, what are you even talking about? Don't be ridiculous.
